text: Apologies for resurrecting an old thread, but has anyone worked out how to activate Bold and Italic button options in the RichText module when using a custom font? Custom font is working great apart from these buttons being deactivated...
<@U05UUKBBC1M> we discussed in this thread that it's not currently possible. Maybe the CMS devs will update it but the custom fonts seems to be a new feature and not a priority.
